name: LumberReborn
description:
This is a game about creating a new forest and selling the wood for profit!

This game was made for the 2022 GDevlop game jam

https://itch.io/jam/gdevelop-game-jam-1

Game saves automaticaly every 20 seconds or save in the settings.

Set music volume in settings

e0 is the amount of extra numbers. 230e3 would be 230,000 or 500e5 = 50,000,000

You have to have a producer to produce items and a collector to sell them.

Tutorial:

Controls(Pc)

Left click(Drag) to select and place items.

left click anywhere in the gray on the left side of the screen to deselect.

Left click to delete items while un-selected

Right click to delete items.

Controls(Mobile)

Left click(Drag) to select and place items.

Left click anywhere in the gray on the left side of the screen to deselect.

Left click to delete items while un-selected

Start from a smol 20 cash

And build for cash!

Then spend that money to Rebirth for more cash!

Everything in this game was made by me.

This is the settings page. (Not much here. Just a save button,volume slider an reset button.)

Hope you enjoyed!
